## Notes

* A special ability that grants the Paladin a set of three "Zealous Aura" modals, each giving a bonus to allies (and self) in an AoE. Only one Zealous Aura may be active at a time, but the Paladin may switch between them freely. The currently selected aura is automatically activated upon entering combat.
* This ability is for display only. It doesn't show up in the character sheet, and is only shown in the ability tree. Although technically a passive, it appears in the active section of the ability tree.
